itinerary.mapNote: North face of Kailash. Closest approach to sacred peak. 5010m.
After Dolma La 5630m. Gauri Kund sacred lake. 4790m.
Kora complete. Return to Darchen base. 4560m.

waypoints.name: Mount Kailash
waypoints.note: Sacred to Hinduism, Buddhism, Jainism, Bon. Never been climbed.

waypoints.name: Dolma La Pass
waypoints.note: Holiest pass in Tibet. Highest point of the Kora. 84 gods said to reside here.

waypoints.name: Gauri Kund (Lake Mansarovar nearby)
waypoints.note: Sacred emerald lake below Dolma La. Pilgrims bathe here.

waypoints.name: Darchen Base
waypoints.note: Kora start/end village. Last services. Permit checks.

waypoints.name: North Face Viewpoint
waypoints.note: Clearest view of Kailash north face from Drirapuk area.
